reviews.review_msg: Nicest professor ever. Good teacher (can be a bit dry sometimes) and not to difficult. Favorite history professor so far!

Interesting lectures, boring textbook, disfunctional tutorials, and surprisingly little writing for a W class. As long as you show up and put in some effort you should do well. It's a class well-worth taking and although it probably won't be your favorite ever, it also won't be your least favorite. Also, super nice prof who is willing to laugh.

Roxanne was a fabulous instructor! Super energetic about the course content and always willing to take questions from students. Very willing to help students in her office hours. Assignments were fair and allowed for students to improve their writing skills. Enjoyed the selection of readings and films we watched in class.
